block.p: KOSSIN-Marion. Of Teaneck, NJ, on August 7, 2000, beloved wife of the late Dr. Leon Kossin, devoted mother of Warren Kossin, Sara Tractenberg, Roni Epstein, dear sister of Rose Goldberg, loving grandmother of Howard, Beth, Charles, Lawrence, Steven, Elyse, Cheryl and great-grandmother of Matthew and Samantha. Services at ''Wien & Wien'', corner of Park and Passaic, Hackensack, NJ, on Wednesday, August 9 at 11:30 A.M.
